statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_inventory;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM fashion_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM fashion_inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT item_name, price FROM fashion_inventory WHERE category = 'Shoes';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM fashion_inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_inventory WHERE category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM fashion_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM fashion_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM fashion_inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND quantity <= 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(item_id) AS item_count FROM fashion_inventory GROUP BY category ORDER BY item_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE address LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street' AND phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT item_id, production_date, production_quantity FROM Production WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, category FROM Inventory WHERE category='Electronics' AND quantity < 50
SELECT customer_name, order_date, item_name FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.item_id = Inventory.id ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM Production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT item_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_stock FROM Inventory GROUP BY category HAVING total_stock > 200
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT item_id, quantity_produced, production_date FROM production ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, price ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT inventory.item_name, production.quantity_produced FROM inventory INNER JOIN production ON inventory.item_id = production.item_id WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM Product ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT supplier_name, location, email FROM Supplier;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, category FROM Product WHERE quantity < 1000 AND category IS NOT NULL;

SELECT p.product_name, i.location, o.customer_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE i.available_quantity > 0 AND o.quantity_ordered > 1 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
